description: Test for significant differences among group means and display the results.
name: Compare means

properties.name: equal_variances
properties.description: Do groups to compare have an equal variance? If yes, ANOVA and t-test will be used. If not (default) Kruskal-Wallis and Wilcoxon tests will be applied.

properties.name: comparison
properties.description: Which comparison to do for post-hoc tests (pairwise, comparison to the mean of all samples, comparison to a reference group).

properties.name: displayed.aggregate
properties.description: Which aggregates and error bars to display on top of individual data points.

properties.name: first.plot.layer
properties.description: First plot layer to visualise data distribution (boxplot, violin, or dotplot).

properties.name: displayed.box
properties.description: Display a shape to visualise data distribution (boxplot, violin, or none).

properties.name: reference_index
properties.description: Index of the group used as reference (only used if comparison is set to reference).

properties.name: pval_label
properties.description: How to display p-values (p.signif = stars, p.format = p-values).

properties.name: y_limit_min
properties.description: Y axis lower limit (if empty, the minimum value of the data will be used).

properties.name: y_limit_max
properties.description: Y axis upper limit (if empty, the minimum value of the data will be used).
